original_text: The sound of a carefree multitude was with her; and with men of the common sort, drunkards were brought from the wilderness; and they put bracelets on the hands of the women, and beautiful crowns on their heads.
korean_text: 그 무리와 편히 지껄이고 즐겼으며 또 광야에서 잡류와 술 취한 사람을 청하여 오매 그들이 팔찌를 그 손목에 끼우고 아름다운 관을 그 머리에 씌웠도다

sentences.original_text: The sound of a carefree multitude was with her
sentences.korean_translation: 한가로운 무리의 소리가 그녀와 함께 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and with men of the common sort
drunkards were brought from the wilderness
and they put bracelets on the hands of the women
and beautiful crowns on their heads
